# React Frontend

- Use MUI components
- Use MUI theme (in `theme.tsx`)

## Formatting

- Always use `prettier` to format your code.

# Python backends

## Package manager

- Use `uv`.

## Types

- Always use Python type hints.
- Use Python 3.10+ hints: `str | None` instead of `Optional[str]`.

## Formatting

- Always use `ruff` to format your code.
